vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityReason: The `onlyUnlocked` modifier relies on `block.timestamp` to compare it against a hardcoded future time. Miners can manipulate the block timestamp to their advantage, which can lead to premature unlocking of the functionality reliant on this modifier.
vulnerabilities.potentialSecurityRisk: Malicious miners can manipulate the `block.timestamp` to unlock features or functions of the contract before they are intended to be available, possibly allowing unauthorized access or funds to be released to themselves or other addresses.
